name: Jared Cacurak
tagline: I want to work with passionate individuals on challenging projects in an environment where I can experiment, innovate, learn, and have fun.
body:
## Skills and Abilities
* Grasp of modern software design practices and trends
* Passion for solving unique problems
* Strong software engineering foundation
* Able to work in a fast paced environment
* Excellent technical and general communication skills

## Technologies
* JavaScript
* Java
* C#
* HTML
* CSS

## Open Source Projects
### [cujoJS](http://cujojs.com)
#### May 2012 - Present

## Professional Experience
### [First Insight Incorporated](http://www.firstinsight.com), Pittsburgh, PA
#### April 2014 - July 2016
Contributed to a SaaS solution that predicts the performance and optimal pricing of new products within 48 to 72 hours.

### [Giant Eagle Incorporated](http://gianteagle.com), Pittsburgh, PA
#### May 2011 - April 2014
Provided tailored software solutions to augment third party pharmacy systems  

### Prometheus Firing Systems, Pittsburgh, PA
#### November 2010 - Present
Worked with a small multidisciplinary team to build an end-to-end pyrotechnic firing system  

### [Access Data Corporation](http://www.accessdc.com), Pittsburgh, PA
#### November 2010 - May 2011
Built an engine for generating custom high volume financial data extracts  

### [Touchtown Incorporated](http://www.touchtown.us), Oakmont, PA
#### June 2010 - November 2010
Built an interactive map for viewing residential alerts and network events  
Developed a communication dashboard connecting residentsâ€™ devices to staff  

### [The Bank of New York Mellon](http://www.bnymellon.com), Pittsburgh, PA
#### March 2009 - June 2010
Designed a web API for an existing document workflow management systems  

### [American Eagle Outfitters](http://www.ae.com), Warrendale, PA
#### January 2008 - March 2009
Developed a store support portal to help identify and resolve store system problems  
Created a mobile store replenishment application  
Maintained gift card purchasing kiosk application  
Prototyped a store to store communication system  

### [Rite Aid Corporation](http://www.riteaid.com), Camp Hill, PA
#### November 2006 - January 2008
Maintained the content management system for RiteAid.com  
Developed solutions for customer specific marketing campaigns and promotions  
Established informal engineer meetings and peer mentoring program  
Worked with business partners to draft mobile strategy  

### [The Hershey Company](http://www.hersheys.com), Hershey, PA
#### October 2005 - November 2006
Developed a web based inventory tracking system for chocolate products' rework and waste  
Maintained software for robotic barcode generators and applicators  
Coordinated hardware and software deployments to 16 manufacturing plants throughout North America  

## Education
2002 - 2005 Bachelor of Computer Science, [Indiana University of Pennsylvania (IUP)](http://www.iup.edu/)

## Interests
* Polyglot Programming (Python, Groovy, Clojure, Go)
* Software Craftsmanship
* Machine Learning
* Internet of Things
* [Other](https://github.com/jaredcacurak/Reading-List)

## Activities
### Deer Lakes Youth Soccer
#### 2014 - Present
